results.title: Alien: Covenant
results.creator_credit: Scott Free Productions, Brandywine Productions, TSG Entertainment, 20th Century Fox, Chris Seagers, Mark Huffam, Michael Schaefer, John Logan, Janty Yates, Ridley Scott, Michael Green, Jack Paglen, David Giler and Walter Hill
results.headline_credit: Australia, Canada, New Zealand, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2017
results.brief_description: Bound for a remote planet on the far side of the galaxy, the crew of the colony ship ‘Covenant’ discovers what is thought to be an uncharted paradise, but is actually a dark, dangerous world—which has a sole inhabitant: the ‘synthetic’, David, survivor of the doomed Prometheus expedition.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Scott Free Productions, Brandywine Productions, TSG Entertainment, 20th Century Fox, Chris Seagers, Mark Huffam, Michael Schaefer, John Logan, Janty Yates, Ridley Scott, Michael Green, Jack Paglen, David Giler and Walter Hill
results.headline_credit_for_label: Australia, Canada, New Zealand, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2017
results.description: Bound for a remote planet on the far side of the galaxy, the crew of the colony ship ‘Covenant’ discovers what is thought to be an uncharted paradise, but is actually a dark, dangerous world—which has a sole inhabitant: the ‘synthetic’, David, survivor of the doomed Prometheus expedition.
description_for_label: Bound for a remote planet on the far side of the galaxy, the crew of the colony ship ‘Covenant’ discovers what is thought to be an uncharted paradise, but is actually a dark, dangerous world—which has a sole inhabitant: the ‘synthetic’, David, survivor of the doomed Prometheus expedition.

results.title: Alien
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1979
results.brief_description: During its return to the earth, the spaceship Nostromo intercepts a distress signal from a distant planet. When the crew discovers a chamber containing thousands of eggs on the planet, the crew is unaware of the impending nightmare set to descend upon them…

constellations_other.name: Representation of women in videogames
constellations_other.description: Ms Pac-Man is the first famous female game protagonist, but let's face it – she's just Pac-Man with a bow. This Constellation looks at the history of female representation in videogames.

constellations_other.name: Ladies who own the narrative
constellations_other.description: Despite the lag in making it in mainstream cinema, female action heroes can actually be traced back to the late 19th century in early magic lantern performances of Jane Conquest, who saved both her child and a ship full of men.

results.headline_credit_for_label: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1979
results.description: During its return to the earth, commercial spaceship Nostromo intercepts a distress signal from a distant planet. When a three-member team of the crew discovers a chamber containing thousands of eggs on the planet, a creature inside one of the eggs attacks an explorer. The entire crew is unaware of the impending nightmare set to descend upon them when the alien parasite planted inside its unfortunate host is birthed.
description_for_label: During its return to the earth, commercial spaceship Nostromo intercepts a distress signal from a distant planet. When a three-member team of the crew discovers a chamber containing thousands of eggs on the planet, a creature inside one of the eggs attacks an explorer. The entire crew is unaware of the impending nightmare set to descend upon them when the alien parasite planted inside its unfortunate host is birthed.

results.title: Alice in Wonderland
results.brief_description: On a golden afternoon, young Alice follows a White Rabbit, who disappears down a nearby rabbit hole. Quickly following him, she tumbles into the burrow - and enters the merry, topsy-turvy world of Wonderland! Memorable songs and whimsical escapades highlight Alice’s journey, which culminates in a madcap encounter with the Queen of Hearts - and her army of playing cards!

constellations_other.name: MoCaps and rotos
constellations_other.description: Though VFX continues to push boundaries and brings fantastical worlds and creatures to life, there's still a place for classic animation techniques.

results.description: On a golden afternoon, young Alice follows a White Rabbit, who disappears down a nearby rabbit hole. Quickly following him, she tumbles into the burrow - and enters the merry, topsy-turvy world of Wonderland! Memorable songs and whimsical escapades highlight Alice’s journey, which culminates in a madcap encounter with the Queen of Hearts - and her army of playing cards!

results.title: Alias
results.brief_description: Sydney Bristow, an agent who has been tricked to believe she is working for the U.S. government, is actually working for a criminal organization named the Alliance of Twelve. Upon learning this, Sydney becomes a double agent for the real CIA.

constellations_other.name: Splicing history and silencing the lambs
constellations_other.description: With plastic strips coated with light-sensitive emulsions, film strips captured light and created moving pictures. In this Constellation we trace celluloid and splicing as plot device to serial killers, secrets agents and Super 8.

results.description: Sydney Bristow, an agent who has been tricked to believe she is working for the U.S. government, is actually working for a criminal organization named the Alliance of Twelve. Upon learning this, Sydney becomes a double agent for the real CIA.

results.title: ALF
results.creator_credit: Alien Productions, Bernie Brillstein and Paul Fusco
results.brief_description: A furry alien wiseguy comes to live with a terran family after crashing into their garage.

constellations_other.name: The power of alternate endings
constellations_other.description: This Constellation about alternate perspectives, dream states, sitcoms and spin-offs was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Alien Productions, Bernie Brillstein and Paul Fusco
results.description: A furry alien wiseguy comes to live with a terran family after crashing into their garage.
description_for_label: A furry alien wiseguy comes to live with a terran family after crashing into their garage.

results.title: Aladdin
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Ron Clements, John Musker, Roger Allers, Kevin Lima, Darrell Rooney, Burny Mattinson, Chris Sanders, Brian Pimental, Francis Glebas, Larry Leker, Kevin Harkey, Patrick A. Ventura, Rebecca Reese, Daan Jippes, James Fujii, David S. Smith, Sue C. Nichols, Ted Elliott and Terry Rossio
results.brief_description: Princess Jasmine grows tired of being forced to remain in the palace, so she sneaks out into the marketplace, in disguise, where she meets street-urchin Aladdin. The couple falls in love, although Jasmine may only marry a prince. After being thrown in jail, Aladdin becomes embroiled in a plot to find a mysterious lamp, with which the evil Jafar hopes to rule the land.

constellations_other.name: Cautionary tales and magic lantern projectors
constellations_other.description: Early magic lantern projections depicted cautionary religious scenes and fairytales, just like cinema did in its infancy.

constellations_other.name: Bell & Howell Projector 621: This picture has been edited for content
constellations_other.description: The Bell & Howell-Gaumont Model 621 projector was originally used entertain the shearers on a sheep farm in South Australia with the films screened sometimes edited for distribution.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Pictures, Ron Clements, John Musker, Roger Allers, Kevin Lima, Darrell Rooney, Burny Mattinson, Chris Sanders, Brian Pimental, Francis Glebas, Larry Leker, Kevin Harkey, Patrick A. Ventura, Rebecca Reese, Daan Jippes, James Fujii, David S. Smith, Sue C. Nichols, Ted Elliott and Terry Rossio

The couple falls in love, although Jasmine may only marry a prince. After being thrown in jail, Aladdin becomes embroiled in a plot to find a mysterious lamp, with which the evil Jafar hopes to rule the land.

results.title: Akira
results.creator_credit: Akira Committee Company Ltd., Mainichi Broadcasting System (MBS), Sumitomo Corporation, Toho Company, Ltd., Studio Fuga, Studio Aoi, TMS Entertainment, Kodansha, Bandai Entertainment Inc., Katsuhiro Otomo, Kazuo Ebisawa, Yuji Ikehata, Koji Ono, Izo Hashimoto, Haruyo Kanesaku, Shunzo Kato, Yutaka Maseba, Yoshimasa Mizuo, Hiroe Tsukamoto and Ryôhei Suzuki
results.brief_description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two teenagers and a group of psychics can stop.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Akira Committee Company Ltd., Mainichi Broadcasting System (MBS), Sumitomo Corporation, Toho Company, Ltd., Studio Fuga, Studio Aoi, TMS Entertainment, Kodansha, Bandai Entertainment Inc., Katsuhiro Otomo, Kazuo Ebisawa, Yuji Ikehata, Koji Ono, Izo Hashimoto, Haruyo Kanesaku, Shunzo Kato, Yutaka Maseba, Yoshimasa Mizuo, Hiroe Tsukamoto and Ryôhei Suzuki
results.description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two teenagers and a group of psychics can stop.
description_for_label: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two teenagers and a group of psychics can stop.

results.title: Airplane!
results.brief_description: Alcoholic pilot, Ted Striker has developed a fear of flying due to wartime trauma, but nevertheless boards a passenger jet in an attempt to woo back his stewardess girlfriend. Food poisoning decimates the passengers and crew, leaving it up to Striker to land the plane.

constellations_other.name: Atari’s Basketball
constellations_other.description: Released in 1979, just in time for the arcade heydays of the early 1980s, Atari’s Basketball was the first basketball game to use a trackball as the input mechanic and a 45-degree angled side view. This set the standard for basketball games that followed.

results.description: Alcoholic pilot, Ted Striker has developed a fear of flying due to wartime trauma, but nevertheless boards a passenger jet in an attempt to woo back his stewardess girlfriend. Food poisoning decimates the passengers and crew, leaving it up to Striker to land the plane with the help of a glue-sniffing air traffic controller and Striker’s vengeful former Air Force captain, who must both talk him down.
description_for_label: Alcoholic pilot, Ted Striker has developed a fear of flying due to wartime trauma, but nevertheless boards a passenger jet in an attempt to woo back his stewardess girlfriend. Food poisoning decimates the passengers and crew, leaving it up to Striker to land the plane with the help of a glue-sniffing air traffic controller and Striker’s vengeful former Air Force captain, who must both talk him down.

results.title: Ai Weiwei: Never Sorry
results.brief_description: Director Alison Klayman chronicles the complexities of Ai Wei Wei’s life for three years, beginning with his rise to public prominence via blog and Twitter after he questioned the deaths of more than 5,000 students in the 2008 Sichuan earthquake.

constellations_other.name: The Family Law
constellations_other.description: An exploration of Asian representation on screens around the world that delves into TV, cinema, documentaries and Disney princesses.

results.description: Ai Weiwei is known for many things – great architecture, subversive in-your-face art, and political activism. He has also called for greater transparency on the part of the Chinese state. Director Alison Klayman chronicles the complexities of Ai’s life for three years, beginning with his rise to public prominence via blog and Twitter after he questioned the deaths of more than 5,000 students in the 2008 Sichuan earthquake. The record continues through his widely publicized arrest in Beijing in April of 2011. As Ai prepares various works of art for major international exhibitions, his activism heats up, and his run-ins with China’s authorities become more and more frequent.
description_for_label: Ai Weiwei is known for many things – great architecture, subversive in-your-face art, and political activism. He has also called for greater transparency on the part of the Chinese state. Director Alison Klayman chronicles the complexities of Ai’s life for three years, beginning with his rise to public prominence via blog and Twitter after he questioned the deaths of more than 5,000 students in the 2008 Sichuan earthquake. The record continues through his widely publicized arrest in Beijing in April of 2011. As Ai prepares various works of art for major international exhibitions, his activism heats up, and his run-ins with China’s authorities become more and more frequent.

results.title: Across the Universe
results.creator_credit: Revolution Studios, Team Todd, Gross Entertainment, Sound Films, Matthew Gross, Richard Baratta, Jennifer Todd, Albert Wolsky, Julie Taymor, Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais
results.brief_description: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in America, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation.

constellations_other.name: Hell no, we won't go
constellations_other.description: The cultural, social, psychological and political effects of the Vietnam War have been explored through cinematic classics, musicals and comedies.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Revolution Studios, Team Todd, Gross Entertainment, Sound Films, Matthew Gross, Richard Baratta, Jennifer Todd, Albert Wolsky, Julie Taymor, Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais
results.description: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in America, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation. Jude falls in love with Lucy, a rich but sheltered American girl who joins the growing anti-war movement in New York’s Greenwich Village. As the body count in Vietnam rises, political tensions at home spiral out of control and the star-crossed lovers find themselves in a psychedelic world gone mad.
description_for_label: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in America, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation. Jude falls in love with Lucy, a rich but sheltered American girl who joins the growing anti-war movement in New York’s Greenwich Village. As the body count in Vietnam rises, political tensions at home spiral out of control and the star-crossed lovers find themselves in a psychedelic world gone mad.
